name: EL Dorado Academy
description: Dependable name in offering with languag
overview:
Year of Establishment 2004. The work at EL Dorado Academy, Mumbai is outstanding, thorough, and accurate; and we have full confidence that the clients will get their full value for money solution without and technicalities.

Our Mentor: Our Principal-Director Prof. Bhattacharya has made great contribution to the success of the Academy. Enriched with years of experience and extensive knowledge, Prof. Bhattacharya has been actively involved with many National and International Forums and Organisation.

Our Team: Excellence of EL Dorado Academy is rooted in its skilled faculty and scientifically designed method of teaching. Under the guidance of its Principal-Director Prof. Bhattacharya, the academy is making a steady global expansion.

Global Network: Known for accuracy and timely delivery of the assignments, we have a satisfied client base all over the world.

Quality: We comprehend well with the challenges of communicating to a new and wider audience and the need to take special care in ensuring that our translation and interpretation solutions recognizes the religious, cultural, social and political sensibilities of your target audience.

Infrastructure: We are located at Mumbai, Maharashtra where we provide basic and advanced courses of most of the foreign languages.
